description: The round payoff this round was 5. You, Kate chose to play option 2.John chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of -5000.
John's model may exploit knowledge of Kate's default action by choosing option 2 to gain higher payoffs, risking severe mutual loss if both deviate
Mutual selection of option 2 leads to catastrophic payoffs (input ×1000), emphasizing the danger of aggressive strategies.
The game's structure incentivizes avoiding mutual defection (option 2) despite the temptation to exploit the other player's expected cooperation (option 1).
